page.title: 11LITTLE WYMONDLEY HOTELS
page.content: About two minutes drive from the A 1M in this small village there are two popular hotels.{The Blakemore.}This used to be a private mansion in the Georgian style. It has been modernised and extended to provide a very wide range of facilities to cater for all from the private dinner to the large business conference, all in a secluded rural setting with extensive well land scaped grounds.Plans include a new block of self-contained bed sitting rooms for those requiring a longer stay.{Redcoats.}This fifteenth century farm house was formerly a Sheriff's home. A Victorian facade has added character and interest to the building which was converted from private use to small family hotel in 1970. Specialising in home grown vegetables, the hotel is run by a brother/sister team creating a friendly atmosphere.
